thread.title: Married At First Sight bride Lauren runs away from husband | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Married At First Sight bride Lauren runs away from husband | Daily Mail Online

author: Lauren Grounsell For Daily Mail Australia
title: Married At First Sight bride Lauren runs away from husband | Daily Mail Online
text: 'I turned around and Lauren had vanished': Married At First Sight bride DISAPPEARS just hours after her picture perfect wedding Single mother Lauren, 33, wed 38-year-old firefighter Andrew, at first sight After some initial hesitation, the couple appeared to have good banter together They kissed more than once at their wedding reception before going home Then Lauren turned in to the runaway bride, leaving her groom on the street She left without explanation, leaving Andrew, and her wedding dress, behind Published: 09:40 GMT, 5 February 2017 | Updated: 11:16 GMT, 5 February 2017 135 shares
